parameters: \msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]That mush-mom looks so happy now that
we helped her appease her baby.
But I can only make people happy if I’m around,
and I don’t know how long I will be if I stay like this.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]That mush-mom looks so happy now that
we helped her appease her baby.
But I can only make people happy if I’m around,
and I don’t know how long I will be if I stay like this.
I wish I would’ve helped her instead of scaring her.
She only wanted to use us to make her happy.
She’s just like the rest of them.

\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]Hey, the knight got his cart back.
And he’s talking to his husband again.
\msgrows[3]They do. It’s what I love about this world;
how alive everyone and everything is.
I’d miss it if I went back, Teo.
I wish I could explain it to you.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]Hey, the knight got his cart back.
And he’s talking to his husband again.
\msgrows[3]They do. It’s what I love about this world;
how alive everyone and everything is.
I’d miss it if I went back, Teo.
I wish I could explain it to you.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]The knight looks pretty bummed about his mirror...
I hope it wasn’t too expensive.
I wouldn’t want his husband to be angry at him.
It proves how alive your world is.
It’s one of the things that I’d miss most if I went back.

I hope it wasn’t too expensive.
I wouldn’t want his husband to be angry at him.
It proves how alive your world is.

It looks like he still hasn’t found his kids...
And that’s why we had to do it- had to do all of this.
Because I can’t be alone again.

Because I can’t be alone again.
I’m so glad they’re all together again.
Maybe that means you would understand why I have to do this.

and hard work should always be recognized...

and hard work should always be recognized...
I wonder if she’ll do okay on her homework
She tried to get us to do her work for her.
People like that deserve what they get.

I wonder if he’s found anybody to dance with him?
It’s such a waste of time.

It was so much fun when you helped me dance
with him! We should do it again sometime.
\msgrows[3] Yeah... I guess it was pretty fun.

\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]We sure had laughs with those clams, didn’t we?
I enjoyed having the ability to make their day like that.
\msgrows[3]It’s a good feeling to be able to influence things,
isn’t it? That’s why I have to do this Teo.
I want to be real, to be here.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]We sure had laughs with those clams, didn’t we?
I enjoyed having the ability to make their day like that.
\msgrows[3]It’s a good feeling to be able to influence things,
isn’t it? That’s why I have to do this Teo.

\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]We sure roasted those clams, didn’t we?
I can’t help feeling guilty about it. I don’t know how
I feel about having the ability to ruin their day like that.
It’s good to feel powerful, when I’m actually here,
I won’t need to act through people to do that anymore.

\msgrows[3]Just have to bring her to my pot
You just need me to throw in the ingredients right?
Then we can get out of here?
There’s just one thing you’re missing;
It’s a heart fueled by an innocent soul, your soul Teo.
\msgrows[3]I’m so sorry it has to come to this,
but I won’t go back to that dark,
angry abyss and you have no idea what it’s like
I couldn’t have done any of this without you.
\msgrows[3]But I promised myself I would never be alone again
and I don’t know how else to keep that... unless...
What do you need me to do?
I- I can’t do this. Not to you, Teo.
Let’s just get out of here and never look back.
There’s just one thing you’re missing;
It’s a heart fueled by an innocent soul, your soul Teo.

but I won’t go back to that dark,
angry abyss and you have no idea what it’s like
